seo.title: Darmowe audio-przewodniki spacerowe po Positano
seo.description: Gdzie pobrać trasy audio, jak przygotować sprzęt i zasady dobrego zachowania na szlakach.

intro: Follow the route and listening tips below, and save the files over Wi-Fi before you step outside.

sections.title: Route
body: Take your time on terraces, but stay mindful of locals and porters using the staircases for deliveries.

sections.title: How to listen
body: Download the audio on hostel Wi-Fi or stream at known hotspots along the route.
Keep volume low on stairs and pop one earbud out when crossing roads or passing other walkers.

a: Plan for 45–60 minutes including photo stops and terrace breaks.
